title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Trackpad
message: Customer came in for glitchy trackpad.  I replaced the trackpad and it still is glitching.  It moves all over the place.  Any other ideas? No liquid damage.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Trackpad
message: Replaced the trackpad and cable? Same on battery and AC? Check the 18V supply to the trackpad, trackpad must be plugged in for that to work.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Trackpad
message:
replaced trackpad and cable. same on battery and ac. 18.55v constant

okay nevermind.  found a few loose pins on the fpc connector.  re soldered it and working fine now.
